text: 22|67|(he nabee!) hamane pratyek samudaay ke lie (ibaadat kee) vidhi nirdhaarit kar dee thee, jisaka ve paalan karate rahe, atah unhen aapase is (islaam ke niyam) ke sambandh mein vivaad nahin karana chaahie aur aap apane paalanahaar kee or logon ko bulaen, vaastav mein, aap seedhee raah par hain[1].
